4:
This is single parameter: <atext name="aParam" type="param">aParam</atext>
Same parameter at another location: <atext name="aParam" type="param">aParam</atext>

Parent group's settings:
- Expand after typing delimiter (discard delimiter)
- Delimiters: Enter, Tab

With above Delimiters setting, it is possible to type space in parameter.
For example:
1. Type: testparam1single param with spaces
2. Hit Enter key or Tab key

If parent group's settings:
- Expand after typing abbreviation
Parameter will be converted to Field after typing abbreviation.
